00033 class Coordinate3D {
00034 protected:
00035         double x, y, z;
00036         
00037 public:
00040         Coordinate3D();
00045         Coordinate3D(double x, double y, double z);
00048         ~Coordinate3D();
00049         
00054         void setX(double x) { this->x = x; }
00059         void setY(double y) { this->y = y; }
00064         void setZ(double z) { this->z = z; }
00065         
00069         double getX() { return x; }
00073         double getY() { return y; }
00077         double getZ() { return z; }
00078         
00083         double distance(Coordinate3D *c) {
00084                 double dx = getX()-c->getX();
00085                 double dy = getY()-c->getY();
00086                 double dz = getZ()-c->getZ();
00087                 return (double)sqrt(dx*dx+dy*dy+dz*dz);
00088         }
00089         
00090         Coordinate* projection( double xOffset, double yOffset, double scale, double distance );
00091         void applyMatrix( Matrix< double >* );
00092         void translate( Coordinate3D* );
00093         
00098         void write(std::ostream &stream) const;
00099 };
00100         
00101 inline std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &stream, const Coordinate3D & c) {
00102         c.write(stream);
00103         return stream;
00104 }
